content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (-2, -76)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-2, -76) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-1, -74) smelting iron plates
The drill is working but output is blocked due to missing sink entity

###Copper/Iron Mining and Processing Setup at (-21, -73)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21, -73) mining copper and iron ore
- Iron chest at (-21.5, -74.5) for storage
- Burner inserter at (-20.5, -74.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-19, -74) smelting copper plates

###Iron Smelting Line at (3, -73)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (3, -73) actively smelting iron ore
- Stone furnace at (5, -73) idle due to lack of ingredients

ERROR TIPS

###Entity Placement and Connection Issues
- Ensure proper output connections for mining drills - the drill at (-2, -76) has blocked output due to missing sink entity
- When setting up mining/smelting chains, make sure to connect all components properly with inserters or belts

###Resource Management
- Check coal availability before attempting to insert fuel into entities
- Keep track of coal inventory to avoid running out of fuel for burner entities

###Production Chain Setup
- When setting up multiple furnaces, ensure proper resource distribution
- Make sure all furnaces in a production line have access to both fuel and raw materials
